attributes.action: PUT AN END TO THE UK TV LICENCE
attributes.additional_details:
It's time the Government put an end to this age-old compulsory TV licence / tax and the BBC sought money through alternate means, either by subscription or advertising - or both.  To enforce these fees onto everyone, whether you watch/listen to the BBC is unethical.

The Government is here to serve the people - not the Corporation - so let the people speak.
